items.sentence: I\'m fairly certain Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
The more you do now, the less you\'ll have to do tomorrow.
I don\'t think that I can convince Tom to stop doing that.
I\'m sure Tom wasn\'t surprised that Mary didn\'t show up.
Tom had several bags of gold dust in the trunk of his car.
Tom has a house in Boston. He also has a house in Chicago.
Tom has a reputation of never getting things done on time.
Tom has been singing professionally since he was thirteen.
I could force you to do that, but I don\'t really want to.
I could tell that Tom didn\'t really want to talk to Mary.
